original_text: Then Jehoash the son of Jehoahaz took again from Ben-hadad the son of Hazael the cities that he had taken from Jehoahaz his father in war. Three times Joash defeated him and recovered the cities of Israel.
korean_text: 여호아하스의 아들 요아스가 하사엘의 아들 벤하닷의 손에서 성읍을 다시 빼앗으니 이 성읍들은 자기 부친 여호아하스가 전쟁 중에 빼앗겼던 것이라 요아스가 벤하닷을 세 번 쳐서 무찌르고 이스라엘 성읍들을 회복하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then Jehoash the son of Jehoahaz
took again from Ben-hadad the son of Hazael
the cities that he had taken
from Jehoahaz his father in war
and recovered the cities of Israel
